description.narrative: Mongolia II - Water Sector Project: The project will expand available water supply through three components that will support: the construction of new groundwater wells downstream from Ulaanbaatar and introduces a state-of-the-art water purification plant to remove contaminants and ensure that the water is ready for widespread municipal use; the construction of a new wastewater recycling plant and pipelines to provide high-quality treated wastewater that can be used by industries; and policy reforms, capacity building, and technical assistance to improve the long-term sustainability of Ulaanbaatar's water supply.
